product_name: Stonewear Designs Gila Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: In a word, enchanting. The Stonewear Designs Gila top bounces onto the scene in bright, whimsical colors and playful patterns that shout feminity. Tencel(R) lyocell and polyester blend has a soft, smooth feel. Shirred at the waist with single-needle topstitching, and a shapely crossover bodice make this the perfect yoga-to-dinner top. Long raglan sleeves and elastic at the outside cuffs ensure great range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: In a word, enchanting. The Stonewear Designs Gila top bounces onto the scene in bright, whimsical colors and playful patterns that shout feminity.
